eu.ensg.tsi.azarzelli.gama.domain

Class Terrain

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.ensg.tsi.azarzelli.gama.domain.Terrain

  • public class Terrain
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class, used to generate procedural DEMs from files, extent or generation method. It can also export them.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double altitudeFactor
      Factor to multiply the default results (between 0 and 1) and obtain realistic altitudes.
      private double cellSize
      Size of a DEM cell along X and Y axes in the projection unit.
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_PROJECTION
      Default projection used by the API.
      private IGenerationStrategy generationStrategy
      Procedural generation algorithm strategy.
      private double[][] matrix
      Elevation matrix containing an altitude value for each point.
      private java.lang.String projectionName
      Name of the projection system.
      static int RASTER_FILE 
      static int VECTOR_FILE 
      private double xMax
      Maximum X coordinate.
      private double xMin
      Minimum X coordinate.
      private double yMax
      Maximum Y coordinate.
      private double yMin
      Minimum Y coordinate.

        public static final int RASTER_FILE
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • VECTOR_FILE

        public static final int VECTOR_FILE
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_PROJECTION

        public static final java.lang.String DEFAULT_PROJECTION
        Default projection used by the API. Currently: EPSG:3857, pseudo Mercator in meters
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • xMin

        private double xMin
        Minimum X coordinate. Units depends of the projection.

      • yMin

        private double yMin
        Minimum Y coordinate. Units depends of the projection.

      • xMax

        private double xMax
        Maximum X coordinate. Units depends of the projection.

      • yMax

        private double yMax
        Maximum Y coordinate. Units depends of the projection.

      • cellSize

        private double cellSize
        Size of a DEM cell along X and Y axes in the projection unit.

      • projectionName

        private java.lang.String projectionName
        Name of the projection system. Example: "EPSG:4326"

      • altitudeFactor

        private double altitudeFactor
        Factor to multiply the default results (between 0 and 1) and obtain realistic altitudes. Corresponds to the maximum altitude wanted.

      • generationStrategy

        private IGenerationStrategy generationStrategy
        Procedural generation algorithm strategy.

      • matrix

        private double[][] matrix
        Elevation matrix containing an altitude value for each point.

      • Terrain

        public Terrain(double xMin,
               double yMin,
               double xMax,
               double yMax,
               double cellSize)
        Constructor from the DEM bounds and the cell size
        Parameters:
        xMin - minimum x coordinate wanted
        yMin - minimum y coordinate wanted
        xMax - maximum x coordinate wanted
        yMax - maximum y coordinate wanted
        cellSize - size of a cell, in the same units as x and y

      • Terrain

        public Terrain(double xMin,
               double yMin,
               double xMax,
               double yMax,
               double cellSize,
               java.lang.String generationStrategyName)
        Constructor from the DEM bounds, the cell size and a generation method name
        Parameters:
        xMin - minimum x coordinate wanted
        yMin - minimum y coordinate wanted
        xMax - maximum x coordinate wanted
        yMax - maximum y coordinate wanted
        cellSize - size of a cell, in the same units as x and y
        generationStrategyName - name of the generation strategy (either random, randomNoise, perlinNoise or DiamondSquare

      • Terrain

        public Terrain(java.lang.String generationStrategyName)
        Constructor using only a generation strategy name
        Parameters:
        generationStrategyName - name of the generation strategy (either random, randomNoise, perlinNoise or DiamondSquare

      • Terrain

        public Terrain(java.lang.String generationStrategyName,
               int nrows,
               int ncols)
        Constructor using a generation strategy name and a number of rows/columns
        Parameters:
        generationStrategyName - name of the generation strategy (either random, randomNoise, perlinNoise or DiamondSquare
        nrows - number of wanted rows
        ncols - number of wanted columns

      • Terrain

        public Terrain(java.lang.String filename,
               int filetype,
               java.lang.String generationStrategyName)
        throws java.io.IOException
        Generic constructor from a geographic file
        Parameters:
        filename - full file path
        filetype - type of the file, either Terrain.RASTER_FILE or Terrain.VECTOR_FILE
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
